Arunas Mazeika

I'm a backend web developer passionate about code who likes to spend his time writing things for the web. While advocating re-factoring above all I also believe that writing simple and clean code is the key for creating great software. Less is MORE!
Nantes, France

Markdown flavour
Sep 19, 2016

I have some text.

I want some italics.

I want some bold.

this is heading 1

this is heading 2

this is heading 3

you want a list? * first * second * third

you want an ordered list? 1. whatever 1. whatever 1. whatever
